title: Wonan
creator_credit: Jonne Severijin, Netherlands Association for Rehabilitation and Burgwal Films
brief_description: One in a thousand people in Holland are handicapped. In rehabilitation centres they learn skills to assist them with day-to-day living but this is a long process. The needs of special home facilities required by the disabled person are discussed with the family so the individual can eventually become independent.
